success_criteria: Linting passes; Unit test coverage > 85% (REQ-1-052); All unit tests pass; SAST & SCA scans report 0 critical vulnerabilities (REQ-1-048).
failure_action: Block PR merge; Post failure report as a PR comment.
escalation_procedure: PR author is responsible for fixing issues.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and known vulnerabilities from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: All backend integration tests pass; All critical-path E2E tests pass; Container vulnerability scan passes (REQ-1-048); Database migration succeeds (REQ-1-062).
failure_action: Halt deployment to staging; Roll back if necessary; Alert DevOps and dev lead.
escalation_procedure: On-call engineer paged if deployment fails.
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment is always stable and reflects a high-quality build.

success_criteria: Staging E2E suite passes with 100% success rate; Manual exploratory testing on staging is complete and signed off by QA; Performance benchmarks (LCP, API latency) are met in the performance environment; Security penetration test findings are addressed.
failure_action: Abort production deployment; Create high-priority tickets for blocking issues.
business_impact: Final checkpoint to prevent regressions and critical issues from reaching production users.
